statements: SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price < 30 OR price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 200 AND price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, price, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY location_name
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_items WHERE price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 20.00
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT company_name, email AS contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT company_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sales.sale_date, inventory.product_name, sales.quantity_sold FROM sales INNER JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.id WHERE sales.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sales.sale_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.location, orders.quantity FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id;
SELECT products.name, warehouses.location, orders.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses ON orders.quantity < warehouses.capacity;

SELECT orders.order_date, products.name, suppliers.location FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id INNER JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, in_stock FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE in_stock > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_address = 'New York' OR customer_address = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
